issues.System.Title: Unable to tag or add the response message as a part of the conversation thread from the bot to the request from the user in skype
issues.System.Description:
I have successfully created my chatbot using Microsoft Bot Framework SDK v4 and tested it successfully on the bot emulator and deployed it on azure(Azure Bot).

Now I want to test it without the bot emulator is it possible? And another question does somebody know how can I connect my bot with the WhatsApp using Twilio (I have also the service url for the bot(the azure service) Your help is much appreciated P.S: I am using the JS version for developing the bot

issues.System.Title: Issues with Action.Execute in Adaptive Card for Outlook: Not Hitting Endpoint

devOps.System.Title: Unable to tag the response message from the bot to the request from the user in skype
Issues with Action.Execute in Adaptive Card for Outlook: Not Hitting Endpoint
During provision, adjust the app insights publishing profile data to include the connection string
